No comments on this thing yet?

Anyways, if it's legit with no problems when downloaded I will keep this going for quite some time.  The only sports game that surpasses this one is Pro Yakyuu Spirits.
Hi, applied the update and fix for 3.55 and have a blank screen on loading, can hear the music but cant see a thing, is there a particular way to get it running.....please help
Great game, works perfectly on Rogero 4.30 **internal only**

Amanbh, Your problem has an easy fix, get off 3.55!! I've been out of the scene for awhile now and just got back into it and got Rogero 4.30 and O.M.g.! I'm having so much fun with it again.  No reason not to update, this is what we've been waiting for!!! THANK YOU TO UPLOADER!!!
